title: Resize Shop Bug
body: So I was in a ranked game and tried to resize my shop, after I did it seems that the hitbox of the shop where it would turn into the resize cursor just took up the entire upper left corner of the shop, meaning i coudn't even press the all items tab. this shit tilted me for the whole ranked game and idk how to fix...

replies.body:
Didn't know that resizing the shop was even a thing!

I just tried it myself and didn't have any drama.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
